clusters.name: Uncategorized Topics (Missing Metadata)
clusters.description: This cluster serves as a placeholder for content items that lack sufficient metadata (title, tags, technology, prerequisites, complexity, etc.) required to accurately identify thematic clusters, establish prerequisite chains, or propose a meaningful learning order. Items in this cluster cannot be properly integrated into a structured curriculum without further details.

items.reason: This item's content, thematic relevance, complexity, and prerequisites cannot be determined as all metadata fields other than 'id' are missing. It is placed here as a placeholder until full item details are available.
